meanings.definition: The quality of being quick and light in movement or action.
meanings.sent1: Her nimblenesses on the dance floor impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The cat's nimblenesses allowed it to catch the mouse effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The nimblenesses of the squirrel made the other animals jealous.
meanings.sent4: His nimblenesses in problem-solving were unmatched in the group.
meanings.sent5: The nimblenesses of the gymnast were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The ability to move quickly and easily.
meanings.sent1: The athlete's nimblenesses helped him win the race.
meanings.sent2: The monkey's nimblenesses in the trees were fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent3: The nimblenesses of the toddler running around the house brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her nimblenesses in dodging obstacles were like a dance.
meanings.sent5: The nimblenesses of the cheetah were unmatched in the animal kingdom.

meanings.sent1: The ninja's nimblenesses allowed him to move stealthily.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's nimblenesses were evident in every graceful step.
meanings.sent3: The nimblenesses of the acrobat were truly impressive.
meanings.sent4: His nimblenesses with a sword were legendary.
meanings.sent5: The nimblenesses of the quarterback on the field were unmatched.
